member.name: M:bflibcs.ConsoleExt.GetInt(System.String)
member.summary: Promts the user for a numerical input using the provided string. Then reads the next line of characters from the input stream and atempts to parse it to an double value type. If the parse failed the user will be promted for a new input untill sucessfull.
member.param: The value passed to Console.Write to prompt the user for the input.
member.returns: The next line of characters from the input stream parsed as a double.
